history.content: Since a D is a passing grade and you say that overall your GPA is OK for CS, I think this is a question for your L&S advisor, unfortunately.

children.subject:
I've copied information from L&S' website on how to schedule an appointment. We are also going to reach out to L&S advisors and give them your contact information, but I recommend making an appointment as soon as you can.

Same-Day Appointments

If you have an urgent concern, schedule an appointment via CalCentral(link is external), call (510) 642-1483 during phone hours, or visit 206 Evans Hall to make a 15-minute same-day appointment with a College Adviser during service hours.  Appointments are released at 9:00 a.m. of the same day of availability. 

Pre-Scheduled Appointments

For program planning, for help choosing your major, or if you have a personal situation affecting your academic performance, make a 30-minute appointment. Plan ahead! Waiting time for advising appointments can be up to two weeks during busy times. To schedule an appointment, visit CalCentral(link is external), call (510) 642-1483 during phone hours, or visit 206 Evans Hall.  Phone hours are Mondays to Thursdays from 9:00 a.m. to 12 noon and 1:00 to 4:00 p.m.; Fridays 10:00 a.m. to 12 noon and 1:00 to 4:00 p.m.
Thanks, how can i contact an advisor?

history.content:
I Hi all. I'm an L&S CS major. This is my final semester at berkeley but I'm struggling. There's a decent chance that my semester gpa might fall below 2.0 and put me on academic probation. However I'm not too worried about my overall or upper division GPAs.

I'm also likely going to get a D in a major-required class.

Should I be concerned about graduation? Thanks so much.
history.subject: Lower than 2.0 semester gpa for last semester?
